name: BUEHNEN Pressure-sensitive adhesive D1586
description: Buehnen Pressure-Sensitive Adhesive D1586 is slight color fluctuations can occur in adhesives, depending on the raw materials and processes used. the hot-melt adhesive 1586 is a pressure-sensitive hot-melt adhesive with high tack combined with high cohesion and good flexibility at cold temperatures. its strength is the combination of high tack and cohesion. this hot-melt adhesive demonstrates excellent adhesion to a wide range of materials, such as wood, paper, cardboard, textiles, leather, metals, ceramics, glass and many plastics, such as Â melamine, abs, ps, pmma, pe, pp, pvc, pc, petp, pa, pom, sbr.
